# The `NullPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/region">Region</a> pass that does nothing, for use as a placeholder in tests. <a href="#details">More...</a>
